title: UFO Laser War in Space
content:
UFO Laser War in Space

Play an early 1980's style space shooter game implemented using modern web technology.
Click here to play the game.
Objectives:
  • Destroy 10 UFOs before your colleague does to win.
  • When your spaceship is destroyed you need an astroid in your color to respawn.
  • Shoot an astroid to cycle its color.
Controls (Touch):
  • Use left part of the screen to move.
  • Right part of the screen to shoot.
  • Shoot to respawn.
Controls (Pointing device):
  • The spaceship will fly in the direction of the pointer.
  • Click to shoot.
  • Click on star in your color respawn.
Full instructions, backstory and credits go here: Instructions for use.
summary: Play an early 1980's style space shooter game implemented using modern web technology.
